title: Remote Virus & Malware Removal
headline: Remove threats without anyone stepping foot inside.
description: We provide remote virus and malware removal for local clients with active support plans. Using secure tools and expert methods, we eliminate infections and restore trust in your system without an in-person visit.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Modern threats like spyware, keyloggers, and fileless malware often avoid detection by traditional antivirus tools.
Some infections survive resets and reinstalls by embedding into startup tasks, boot sectors, or profile data.
Remote cleanup using professional tools can be just as effective as an in-person service when done correctly and securely.

sections.heading: What We Remove
items: Fake antivirus tools and system bloatware
Keyloggers, clipboard grabbers, and tracking agents
Rootkits and persistence-based malware that resist standard removal methods

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: Remote malware removal is only available for local clients who are enrolled in an active support plan.
During your initial setup visit, we install a secure access tool with your consent. Once active, you can request help anytime, and we clean your system remotely.
You stay in control throughout the process. Every session requires your approval, and you can watch live or disconnect at any time.
